preqs: Admission to Masters of Architecture Course, OHS1000

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3120}

description: Professional Studies 1 exposes students to the multiple requirements and determinants that shape the stages of the professional project cycle. Through project-based exercises, students engage with the professional ethics and practices required for project development. The unit analyses the different project stages, with an emphasis on fostering critical and reflective practices.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
